localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.title:
I think the thing I'm most thankful for about being born in the early-1980s is we didn't have social media or cell phone cameras when I was in college

We also didn't really have Wikipedia to write papers but that seems like a fair trade to me
blogPost.author: Ben Carlson

localize.full_text:
我想，我最庆幸自己出生在80年代初的事情，就是在我上大学的时候，我们还没有社交媒体，也没有手机摄像头。

我们也没有真正的维基百科来写论文，但这在我看来是一个公平的交易。

我想，我最慶幸自己出生在80年代初的事情，就是在我上大學的時候，我們還沒有社交媒體，也沒有手機攝像頭。

我們也沒有真正的維基百科來寫論文，但這在我看來是一個公平的交易。

next.excerpt: YouTube Shorts is a short-form video experience for anyone who wants to create short, catchy videos with nothing but their mobile phone. We’ve worked alongside music partners to make sure artists and creators have a library of songs to use in their Shorts.
